00139 static void geom_classify_elements( Mesh* mesh,
00140                                     DomainClassifier::DomainSet* dim_sorted_domains,
00141                                     unsigned num_domain,
00142                                     int dim_indices[4],
00143                                     const std::vector<Mesh::ElementHandle>& elems,
00144                                     std::vector<Mesh::ElementHandle>& unknown_elems,
00145                                     double epsilon,
00146                                     MsqError& err );
00147                                     
00148                                     
00149                                     
00150 static bool compare_sides( unsigned num_vtx,
00151                            const unsigned* idx_set_1,
00152                            const Mesh::VertexHandle* vtx_set_1,
00153                            const unsigned* idx_set_2,
00154                            const Mesh::VertexHandle* vtx_set_2 )
00155 {
00156   unsigned i;
00157   for (i = 0;; ++i) {
00158     if (i >= num_vtx)
00159       return false;
00160     if (vtx_set_1[idx_set_1[0]] == vtx_set_2[idx_set_2[i]])
00161       break;
00162   }
00163   
00164   if (num_vtx == 1)
00165     return true;
00166   
00167   if (vtx_set_1[idx_set_1[1]] == vtx_set_2[idx_set_2[(i+1)%num_vtx]]) {
00168     for (unsigned j = 2; j < num_vtx; ++j)
00169       if (vtx_set_1[idx_set_1[j]] != vtx_set_2[idx_set_2[(i+j)%num_vtx]])
00170         return false;
00171     return true;
00172   }
00173   else if (vtx_set_1[idx_set_1[1]] == vtx_set_2[idx_set_2[(i+num_vtx-1)%num_vtx]]) {
00174     for (unsigned j = 2; j < num_vtx; ++j)
00175       if (vtx_set_1[idx_set_1[j]] != vtx_set_2[idx_set_2[(i+num_vtx-j)%num_vtx]])
00176         return false;
00177     return true;
00178   }
00179   else {
00180     return false;
00181   }
00182 }
00183 
00184 static void find_skin( Mesh* mesh,
00185                        std::vector<Mesh::VertexHandle>& skin_verts,
00186                        std::vector<Mesh::ElementHandle>& skin_elems,
00187                        MsqError& err )
00188 {
00189   std::vector<Mesh::ElementHandle> elements, adj_elem, side_elem;
00190   std::vector<Mesh::VertexHandle> vertices, adj_vtx;
00191   std::vector<size_t> junk;
00192   mesh->get_all_elements( elements, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00193   if (elements.empty())
00194     return;
00195   const unsigned elem_idx[] = { 0, 1, 2, 3 };
00196   
00197   std::vector<unsigned> extra_side_vtx;
00198   for (size_t e = 0; e < elements.size(); ++e) {
00199     Mesh::ElementHandle elem = elements[e];
00200     vertices.clear();
00201     mesh->elements_get_attached_vertices( &elem, 1, vertices, junk, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00202 
00203     EntityTopology type;
00204     mesh->elements_get_topologies( &elem, &type, 1, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00205     const unsigned dim = TopologyInfo::dimension( type );
00206     const unsigned nsides = TopologyInfo::sides( type );
00207     for (unsigned s = 0; s < nsides; ++s) {
00208       unsigned num_side_vtx;
00209       const unsigned* side_vtx = TopologyInfo::side_vertices( type, dim-1, s, num_side_vtx );
00210       adj_elem.clear();
00211       side_elem.clear();
00212       mesh->vertices_get_attached_elements( &vertices[*side_vtx], 1, adj_elem, junk, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00213       
00214       bool found_adj = false;
00215       for (size_t a = 0; a < adj_elem.size(); ++a) {
00216         if (adj_elem[a] == elem)
00217           continue;
00218         EntityTopology adj_type;
00219         mesh->elements_get_topologies( &adj_elem[a], &adj_type, 1, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00220         adj_vtx.clear();
00221         mesh->elements_get_attached_vertices( &adj_elem[a], 1, adj_vtx, junk, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00222         if (TopologyInfo::dimension(adj_type) == dim) {
00223           unsigned nsides2= TopologyInfo::sides( adj_type );
00224           for (unsigned s2 = 0; s2 < nsides2; ++s2) {
00225             unsigned num_side_vtx2;
00226             const unsigned* side_vtx2 = TopologyInfo::side_vertices( adj_type, dim-1, s2, num_side_vtx2 );
00227             if (num_side_vtx2 == num_side_vtx &&
00228                 compare_sides( num_side_vtx, side_vtx, arrptr(vertices), side_vtx2, arrptr(adj_vtx) )) {
00229               found_adj = true;
00230               break;
00231             }
00232           }
00233         }
00234         else {
00235           if (TopologyInfo::corners(adj_type) == num_side_vtx)
00236             if (compare_sides( num_side_vtx, side_vtx, arrptr(vertices), elem_idx, arrptr(adj_vtx) ))
00237               side_elem.push_back( adj_elem[a] );
00238         }
00239       }
00240       
00241       if (!found_adj) {
00242         int ho = TopologyInfo::higher_order( type, vertices.size(), err );  MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00243         // mask mid-element node (because that cannot be on the skin)
00244         ho &= ~(1<<dim);
00245         // if element has other higher-order nodes, we need to find the subset on the skin side
00246         if (ho) {
00247           extra_side_vtx.clear();
00248           extra_side_vtx.insert( extra_side_vtx.end(), side_vtx, side_vtx+num_side_vtx );
00249             // get mid-side node
00250           if (ho & (1<<(dim-1))) {
00251             int idx = TopologyInfo::higher_order_from_side( type, vertices.size(), dim-1, s, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00252             extra_side_vtx.push_back( idx );
00253           }
00254           if (dim == 3 && (ho & 2)) { // if volume element, need mid-edge nodes too
00255             const unsigned nedges = TopologyInfo::edges( type );
00256             for (unsigned e = 0; e < nedges; ++e) {
00257               unsigned junk;
00258               const unsigned* edge_vtx = TopologyInfo::side_vertices( type, 1, e, junk );
00259               assert(edge_vtx && 2 == junk);
00260               unsigned idx = std::find( side_vtx, side_vtx+num_side_vtx, edge_vtx[0] ) - side_vtx;
00261               if (idx < num_side_vtx) {
00262                 if ((edge_vtx[1] == side_vtx[(idx+1)%num_side_vtx]) ||
00263                     (edge_vtx[1] == side_vtx[(idx+num_side_vtx-1)%num_side_vtx])) {
00264                   idx = TopologyInfo::higher_order_from_side( type, vertices.size(), 1, e, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00265                   extra_side_vtx.push_back( idx );
00266                 }
00267               }
00268             }
00269           }
00270           
00271           num_side_vtx = extra_side_vtx.size();
00272           side_vtx = arrptr(extra_side_vtx);
00273         }
00274       
00275         for (unsigned v = 0; v < num_side_vtx; ++v)
00276           skin_verts.push_back( vertices[side_vtx[v]] );
00277         for (unsigned j = 0; j < side_elem.size(); ++j)
00278           skin_elems.push_back( side_elem[j] );
00279       }
00280     }
00281   }
00282   
00283   std::sort( skin_verts.begin(), skin_verts.end() );
00284   skin_verts.erase( std::unique( skin_verts.begin(), skin_verts.end() ), skin_verts.end() );
00285   std::sort( skin_elems.begin(), skin_elems.end() );
00286   skin_elems.erase( std::unique( skin_elems.begin(), skin_elems.end() ), skin_elems.end() );
00287 }
00288 
00289 static void dimension_sort_domains( MeshDomain** domains,
00290                                     const int* dims,
00291                                     unsigned count,
00292                                     std::vector<DomainClassifier::DomainSet>& results,
00293                                     int dim_indices[4],
00294                                     MsqError& err )
00295 {
00296   results.clear();
00297   results.resize(count);
00298   unsigned idx = 0;
00299   int dim;
00300   for (dim = 0; idx < count; ++dim) {
00301     if (dim > 3) {
00302       MSQ_SETERR(err)("Invalid domain dimension", MsqError::INVALID_ARG);
00303       return;
00304     }
00305     dim_indices[dim] = idx;
00306     for (unsigned j = 0; j < count; ++j) {
00307       if (dims[j] == dim) {
00308         results[idx].domain = domains[j];
00309         ++idx;
00310       }
00311     }
00312   }
00313   for (; dim <= 3; ++dim)
00314     dim_indices[dim] = idx;
00315 }
00316 
00317 static void geom_classify_vertices( Mesh* mesh,
00318                                     DomainClassifier::DomainSet* dim_sorted_domains,
00319                                     unsigned num_domain,
00320                                     const std::vector<Mesh::VertexHandle>& vertices,
00321                                     double epsilon,
00322                                     MsqError& err )
00323 {
00324   Vector3D pt;
00325   MsqVertex coord;
00326   unsigned i;
00327   unsigned short dim;
00328   const double epssqr = epsilon*epsilon;
00329   std::vector<Mesh::VertexHandle>::const_iterator iter;
00330   for (iter = vertices.begin(); iter != vertices.end(); ++iter) {
00331     mesh->vertices_get_coordinates( &*iter, &coord, 1, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00332     for (i = 0; i < num_domain; ++i) {
00333         // Call DoF function first just to see if it fails
00334         // (e.g. if domain knows which vertices it is responsible for,
00335         //  it should fail if this vertex isn't one.)
00336       dim_sorted_domains[i].domain->domain_DoF( &*iter, &dim, 1 , err );
00337       if (err || dim > 2) {
00338         err.clear();
00339         continue;
00340       }
00341       pt = coord;
00342       dim_sorted_domains[i].domain->snap_to( *iter, pt );
00343       if ((pt - coord).length_squared() <= epssqr) {
00344         dim_sorted_domains[i].vertices.push_back( *iter );
00345         break;
00346       }
00347     }
00348   }
00349 }
00350 
00351 static void vert_classify_elements( Mesh* mesh,
00352                                     DomainClassifier::DomainSet* dim_sorted_domains,
00353                                     unsigned num_domain,
00354                                     int dim_indices[4],
00355                                     const std::vector<Mesh::ElementHandle>& elems,
00356                                     std::vector<Mesh::ElementHandle>& unknown_elems,
00357                                     MsqError& err )
00358 {
00359     // sort vertex lists for faster search
00360   for (unsigned i = 0; i < num_domain; ++i)
00361     std::sort( dim_sorted_domains[i].vertices.begin(), dim_sorted_domains[i].vertices.end() );
00362   
00363   std::vector<Mesh::ElementHandle>::const_iterator iter;
00364   std::vector<Mesh::VertexHandle> verts;
00365   std::vector<size_t> junk;
00366   for (iter = elems.begin(); iter != elems.end(); ++iter) {
00367     int dom = -1;
00368     verts.clear();
00369     mesh->elements_get_attached_vertices( &*iter, 1, verts, junk, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00370     for (unsigned v = 0; v < verts.size(); ++v) {
00371       int i;
00372       for (i = 0; i < dim_indices[3]; ++i) {
00373         DomainClassifier::DomainSet* d = dim_sorted_domains + i;
00374         if (std::binary_search(d->vertices.begin(), d->vertices.end(), verts[v]))
00375           break;
00376       }
00377         // if any vertex in element has no domain, then element has no domain
00378       if (i < 0) {
00379         dom = -2; 
00380         break;
00381       }
00382         // if vertex is in curve or point, ignore it
00383       else if (i < dim_indices[2])
00384         continue;
00385         // else if we already have a vertex on a different surface,
00386         // element must be in volume (no domain)
00387       else if (dom >= 0 && dom != i) {
00388         dom = -2; 
00389         break;
00390       }
00391       else {
00392         dom = i;
00393       }
00394     }
00395     
00396     if (dom >= 0)
00397       dim_sorted_domains[dom].elements.push_back( *iter );
00398     else if (dom == -1) // all verts on curves or points
00399       unknown_elems.push_back( *iter );
00400   }
00401 }
00402 
00403 static void geom_classify_elements( Mesh* mesh,
00404                                     DomainClassifier::DomainSet* dim_sorted_domains,
00405                                     unsigned num_domain,
00406                                     int dim_indices[4],
00407                                     const std::vector<Mesh::ElementHandle>& elems,
00408                                     std::vector<Mesh::ElementHandle>& unknown_elems,
00409                                     double epsilon,
00410                                     MsqError& err )
00411 {
00412   if (elems.empty())
00413     return;
00414 
00415   const double epssqr = epsilon*epsilon;
00416   Vector3D pt;
00417   MsqVertex coord;
00418   std::vector<Mesh::ElementHandle>::const_iterator iter;
00419   std::vector<Mesh::VertexHandle> verts;
00420   std::vector<MsqVertex> coords;
00421   std::vector<size_t> junk;
00422   for (iter = elems.begin(); iter != elems.end(); ++iter) {
00423     verts.clear();
00424     mesh->elements_get_attached_vertices( &*iter, 1, verts, junk, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00425     coords.resize(verts.size());
00426     mesh->vertices_get_coordinates( arrptr(verts), arrptr(coords), verts.size(), err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00427 
00428       // get all 2D domains that contain first vertex
00429     std::vector<int> doms;
00430     for (int i = dim_indices[2]; i < dim_indices[3]; ++i) {
00431       pt = coords[0];
00432       dim_sorted_domains[i].domain->snap_to( verts[0], pt );
00433       if ((pt - coords[0]).length_squared() <= epssqr)
00434         doms.push_back( i );
00435     }
00436     
00437       // of the 2D domains containing the first vertex,
00438       // remove any that do not contain all other corners of the element.
00439     for (unsigned i = 1; i < verts.size(); ++i) {
00440       for (unsigned j = 0; j < doms.size(); ) {
00441         pt = coords[i];
00442         dim_sorted_domains[doms[j]].domain->snap_to( verts[j], pt );
00443         if ((pt - coords[0]).length_squared() <= epssqr)
00444           ++j;
00445         else
00446           doms.erase( doms.begin()+j );
00447       }
00448     }
00449     
00450     if (doms.size() == 1) 
00451       dim_sorted_domains[doms.front()].elements.push_back( *iter );
00452     else
00453       unknown_elems.push_back( *iter );
00454   }
00455 }
00456 
00457 void DomainClassifier::classify_geometrically( DomainClassifier& result,
00458                                         Mesh* mesh,
00459                                         double tolerance,
00460                                         MeshDomain** domain_array,
00461                                         const int* dimension_array,
00462                                         unsigned array_length,
00463                                         MsqError& err )
00464 {
00465   if (!array_length)
00466     return;
00467 
00468   std::vector<DomainSet> domains;
00469   int dim_indices[4];
00470   dimension_sort_domains( domain_array, dimension_array, array_length, domains, dim_indices, err );
00471   MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00472   
00473     // classify vertices by position
00474   std::vector<Mesh::VertexHandle> vertices;
00475   mesh->get_all_vertices( vertices, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00476   geom_classify_vertices( mesh, arrptr(domains), dim_indices[3], vertices, tolerance, err );
00477   MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00478   
00479     // get elements and types
00480   std::vector<Mesh::ElementHandle> elems;
00481   mesh->get_all_elements( elems, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00482   if (elems.empty())
00483     return;
00484   std::vector<EntityTopology> types( elems.size() );
00485   mesh->elements_get_topologies( arrptr(elems), arrptr(types), elems.size(), err );
00486   MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00487   
00488     // get rid of elements w/ dimension other than 2
00489   size_t w = 0;
00490   for (size_t r = 0; r < elems.size(); ++r) {
00491     if (TopologyInfo::dimension(types[r]) == 2) {
00492       elems[w] = elems[r];
00493       ++w;
00494     }
00495   }
00496   elems.resize( w );
00497  
00498     // classify elements using vertex classification
00499   std::vector<Mesh::ElementHandle> unknown;
00500   vert_classify_elements( mesh, arrptr(domains), domains.size(), dim_indices, elems, unknown, err );
00501   MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00502   
00503     // classify unknown elements geometrically
00504   elems.swap( unknown );
00505   unknown.clear();
00506   geom_classify_elements( mesh, arrptr(domains), domains.size(), dim_indices, elems, unknown, tolerance, err );
00507   
00508   classify_by_handle( result, mesh, arrptr(domains), domains.size(), err );
00509 }
00510   
00511 
00512 void DomainClassifier::classify_skin_geometrically( DomainClassifier& result,
00513                                         Mesh* mesh,
00514                                         double tolerance,
00515                                         MeshDomain** domain_array,
00516                                         const int* dimension_array,
00517                                         unsigned array_length,
00518                                         MsqError& err )
00519 {
00520   if (!array_length)
00521     return;
00522 
00523   std::vector<DomainSet> domains;
00524   int dim_indices[4];
00525   dimension_sort_domains( domain_array, dimension_array, array_length, domains, dim_indices, err );
00526   MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00527   
00528   std::vector<Mesh::VertexHandle> vertices;
00529   std::vector<Mesh::ElementHandle> elements;
00530   find_skin( mesh, vertices, elements, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00531   
00532     // classify vertices by position
00533   geom_classify_vertices( mesh, arrptr(domains), dim_indices[3], vertices, tolerance, err );
00534   MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00535  
00536     // classify elements using vertex classification
00537   std::vector<Mesh::ElementHandle> unknown;
00538   vert_classify_elements( mesh, arrptr(domains), domains.size(), dim_indices, elements, unknown, err );
00539   MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00540   
00541     // classify unknown elements geometrically
00542   elements.swap( unknown );
00543   unknown.clear();
00544   geom_classify_elements( mesh, arrptr(domains), domains.size(), dim_indices, elements, unknown, tolerance, err );
00545 
00546   if (!unknown.empty()) {
00547     MSQ_SETERR(err)("Count not classify all skin elements", MsqError::INVALID_MESH );
00548     return;
00549   }
00550   
00551   classify_by_handle( result, mesh, arrptr(domains), domains.size(), err );
00552 }

00555 
00556 void DomainClassifier::classify_by_tag( DomainClassifier& result,
00557                                         Mesh* mesh,
00558                                         const char* tag_name,
00559                                         MeshDomain** domain_array,
00560                                         const int* id_array,
00561                                         unsigned array_length,
00562                                         MsqError& err )
00563 {
00564   TagHandle tag = mesh->tag_get( tag_name, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00565   
00566   std::string name2;
00567   Mesh::TagType type;
00568   unsigned size;
00569   mesh->tag_properties( tag, name2, type, size, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00570   if (type != Mesh::INT || size != 1) {
00571     MSQ_SETERR(err)(MsqError::TAG_NOT_FOUND,"Tag does not contain single integer value: %s\n", tag_name );
00572     return;
00573   }
00574   
00575   std::vector<DomainSet> sets(array_length);
00576   std::map<int,DomainSet*> idmap;
00577   for (unsigned i = 0; i < array_length; ++i) {
00578     sets[i].domain = domain_array[i];
00579     idmap[id_array[i]] = &sets[i];
00580   }
00581   
00582   std::vector<Mesh::VertexHandle> vertices;
00583   std::vector<Mesh::ElementHandle> elements;
00584   mesh->get_all_vertices( vertices, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00585   mesh->get_all_elements( elements, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00586   if (vertices.empty())
00587     return;
00588   
00589   std::map<int,DomainSet*>::const_iterator iter;
00590   std::vector<int> ids( vertices.size() );
00591   mesh->tag_get_vertex_data( tag, vertices.size(), arrptr(vertices), arrptr(ids), err );  MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00592   for (size_t j = 0; j < vertices.size(); ++j) {
00593     iter = idmap.find( ids[j] );
00594     if (iter != idmap.end())
00595       iter->second->vertices.push_back( vertices[j] );
00596   }
00597   
00598   ids.clear();
00599   ids.resize( elements.size() );
00600   if (!elements.empty()) {
00601     mesh->tag_get_element_data( tag, elements.size(), arrptr(elements), arrptr(ids), err ); 
00602     if (err) {
00603       err.clear();
00604     }
00605     else {
00606       for (size_t k = 0; k < elements.size(); ++k) {
00607         iter = idmap.find( ids[k] );
00608         if (iter != idmap.end())
00609           iter->second->elements.push_back( elements[k] );
00610       }
00611     }
00612   }
00613   
00614   if (!sets.empty())
00615     classify_by_handle( result, mesh, arrptr(sets), sets.size(), err );
00616 }
00617                               
00618 
00619 void DomainClassifier::classify_by_handle( DomainClassifier& result,
00620                                            Mesh* mesh,
00621                                            DomainSet* sets,
00622                                            unsigned array_length,
00623                                            MsqError& err )
00624 {
00625   result.clear();
00626 
00627     // get all vertices and elements
00628   std::vector<Mesh::VertexHandle> vertices;
00629   std::vector<Mesh::ElementHandle> elements;
00630   mesh->get_all_vertices( vertices, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00631   mesh->get_all_elements( elements, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00632 
00633     // sort all arrays so we can merge
00634   std::sort( vertices.begin(), vertices.end() );
00635   std::sort( elements.begin(), elements.end() );
00636   for (unsigned i = 0; i < array_length; ++i) {
00637     std::sort( sets[i].vertices.begin(), sets[i].vertices.end() );
00638     std::sort( sets[i].elements.begin(), sets[i].elements.end() );
00639   }
00640   
00641     // build vertex block list
00642   std::vector<size_t> indices(array_length, 0);
00643   size_t idx = 0;
00644   while (idx < vertices.size()) {
00645     DomainBlock block;
00646     block.firstHandle = vertices[idx];
00647     block.lastHandle = vertices[idx];
00648     
00649       // find domain
00650     unsigned dom = 0;
00651     for (dom = 0; dom < array_length; ++dom) {
00652       const size_t i = indices[dom];
00653       if (i < sets[dom].vertices.size() && sets[dom].vertices[i] == vertices[idx]) {
00654         ++indices[dom];
00655         break;
00656       }
00657     }
00658     ++idx;
00659     if (dom == indices.size()) // no domain
00660       continue;
00661       
00662     block.domain = sets[dom].domain;
00663     while (indices[dom] < sets[dom].vertices.size() &&
00664            sets[dom].vertices[indices[dom]] == vertices[idx]) {
00665       block.lastHandle = vertices[idx];
00666       ++idx;
00667       ++indices[dom];
00668     }
00669     result.vertexList.push_back( block );
00670   }
00671   
00672     // build vertex block list
00673   indices.clear();
00674   indices.resize( array_length, 0 );
00675   idx = 0;
00676   while (idx < elements.size()) {
00677     DomainBlock block;
00678     block.firstHandle = elements[idx];
00679     block.lastHandle = elements[idx];
00680     
00681       // find domain
00682     unsigned dom = 0;
00683     for (dom = 0; dom < array_length; ++dom) {
00684       const size_t i = indices[dom];
00685       if (i < sets[dom].elements.size() && sets[dom].elements[i] == elements[idx]) {
00686         ++indices[dom];
00687         break;
00688       }
00689     }
00690     ++idx;
00691     if (dom == indices.size()) // no domain
00692       continue;
00693       
00694     block.domain = sets[dom].domain;
00695     while (indices[dom] < sets[dom].elements.size() &&
00696            sets[dom].elements[indices[dom]] == elements[idx]) {
00697       block.lastHandle = elements[idx];
00698       ++idx;
00699       ++indices[dom];
00700     }
00701     result.elementList.push_back( block );
00702   }
00703 /*  
00704   printf("\n");
00705   for (unsigned i = 0; i < result.vertexList.size(); ++i) 
00706     printf("v %2lu-%2lu @ %p\n", (unsigned long)result.vertexList[i].firstHandle,
00707                                (unsigned long)result.vertexList[i].lastHandle,
00708                                result.vertexList[i].domain );
00709   for (unsigned i = 0; i < result.elementList.size(); ++i) 
00710     printf("e %2lu-%2lu @ %p\n", (unsigned long)result.elementList[i].firstHandle,
00711                                (unsigned long)result.elementList[i].lastHandle,
00712                                result.elementList[i].domain );
00713   printf("\n");
00714 */
00715 }
00716 
00717 static bool next_vertex( Mesh* mesh, 
00718                          Mesh::VertexHandle& vtx,
00719                          std::set<Mesh::VertexHandle>& unseen,
00720                          MsqError& err )
00721 {
00722   std::vector<Mesh::ElementHandle> vtx_elems;
00723   std::vector<size_t> junk;
00724   
00725   mesh->vertices_get_attached_elements( &vtx, 1, vtx_elems, junk, err );
00726   MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00727 
00728   std::vector<EntityTopology> elem_types( vtx_elems.size() );
00729   if (!vtx_elems.empty()) {
00730     mesh->elements_get_topologies( arrptr(vtx_elems), arrptr(elem_types), vtx_elems.size(), err );
00731     MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00732   }
00733 
00734   std::vector<Mesh::VertexHandle> corners;
00735   for (size_t j = 0; j < vtx_elems.size(); ++j) {
00736     corners.clear();
00737     mesh->elements_get_attached_vertices( &vtx_elems[j], 1, corners, junk, err );
00738     MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00739 
00740     unsigned nedges = TopologyInfo::edges( elem_types[j] );
00741     unsigned vidx = std::find( corners.begin(), corners.end(), vtx ) - corners.begin();
00742     
00743 
00744     // Check mid-edge nodes first, if present
00745     int ho = TopologyInfo::higher_order( elem_types[j], corners.size(), err );
00746     MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00747       // If element has mid-edge nodes *and* current vertex is a corner vertex
00748     if ((ho & 2) && (vidx < TopologyInfo::corners(elem_types[j]))) {
00749       for (unsigned e = 0; e < nedges; ++e) {
00750         const unsigned* edge_verts = TopologyInfo::edge_vertices( elem_types[j], e, err );
00751         MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00752         if (edge_verts[0] == vidx || edge_verts[1] == vidx) {
00753           int idx = TopologyInfo::higher_order_from_side( elem_types[j], corners.size(), 1, e, err );
00754           MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00755           std::set<Mesh::VertexHandle>::iterator f = unseen.find( corners[idx] );
00756           if (f != unseen.end()) {
00757             vtx = *f;
00758             unseen.erase(f);
00759             return true;
00760           }
00761         }
00762       }
00763     }
00764 
00765       // if current vertx is a mid-edge node
00766     else if (ho & 2) {
00767       unsigned d, e;
00768       TopologyInfo::side_from_higher_order( elem_types[j], corners.size(), vidx, d, e, err );
00769       MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00770       if (d != 1)
00771         continue;
00772       const unsigned* edge_verts =  TopologyInfo::edge_vertices( elem_types[j], e, err );
00773       MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00774       for (int v = 0; v < 2; ++v) {
00775         std::set<Mesh::VertexHandle>::iterator f = unseen.find( corners[edge_verts[v]] );
00776         if (f != unseen.end()) {
00777           vtx = *f;
00778           unseen.erase(f);
00779           return true;
00780         }
00781       }
00782     }
00783     
00784     else {
00785       for (unsigned e = 0; e < nedges; ++e) {
00786         const unsigned* edge_verts = TopologyInfo::edge_vertices( elem_types[j], e, err );
00787         MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00788         int idx;
00789         if (edge_verts[0] == vidx)
00790           idx = edge_verts[1];
00791         else if (edge_verts[1] == vidx) 
00792           idx = edge_verts[0];
00793         else
00794           continue;
00795           
00796         std::set<Mesh::VertexHandle>::iterator f = unseen.find( corners[idx] );
00797         if (f != unseen.end()) {
00798           vtx = *f;
00799           unseen.erase(f);
00800           return true;
00801         }
00802       }
00803     }
00804   }
00805   
00806   return false;
00807 } 
00808   
00809 
00810 void DomainClassifier::test_valid_classification( Mesh* mesh,
00811                                                   MsqError& err )
00812 {
00813   size_t i;
00814 
00815   // Get all mesh entities
00816   std::vector<Mesh::VertexHandle> vertices;
00817   std::vector<Mesh::ElementHandle> elements;
00818   mesh->get_all_vertices( vertices, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00819   mesh->get_all_elements( elements, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00820   std::sort( vertices.begin(), vertices.end() );
00821   std::sort( elements.begin(), elements.end() );
00822   
00823   // Get contents of each domain.
00824   std::map<MeshDomain*,int>::iterator iter;
00825   std::map<MeshDomain*,int> idxmap;
00826   for (i = 0; i < vertexList.size(); ++i)
00827     idxmap[vertexList[i].domain] = 0;
00828   for (i = 0; i < elementList.size(); ++i)
00829     idxmap[elementList[i].domain] = 0;
00830   std::vector<DomainSet> domains(idxmap.size());
00831   int idx = 0;
00832   for (iter = idxmap.begin(); iter != idxmap.end(); ++iter) {
00833     iter->second = idx;
00834     domains[idx].domain = iter->first;
00835     ++idx;
00836   }
00837   for (i = 0; i < vertexList.size(); ++i) {
00838     std::vector<Mesh::VertexHandle>::const_iterator s, e;
00839     s = std::lower_bound( vertices.begin(), vertices.end(), vertexList[i].firstHandle );
00840     e = std::upper_bound( vertices.begin(), vertices.end(), vertexList[i].lastHandle );
00841     DomainSet& set = domains[idxmap[vertexList[i].domain]];
00842     std::copy( s, e, std::back_inserter(set.vertices) );
00843   }
00844   for (i = 0; i < elementList.size(); ++i) {
00845     std::vector<Mesh::ElementHandle>::const_iterator s, e;
00846     s = std::lower_bound( elements.begin(), elements.end(), elementList[i].firstHandle );
00847     e = std::upper_bound( elements.begin(), elements.end(), elementList[i].lastHandle );
00848     DomainSet& set = domains[idxmap[elementList[i].domain]];
00849     std::copy( s, e, std::back_inserter(set.elements) );
00850   }
00851 
00852   // guess geometric dimension for each domain
00853   std::map<DomainSet*,int> dimmap;
00854   std::vector<unsigned short> dof;
00855   for (i = 0; i < domains.size(); ++i) {
00856     if (!domains[i].elements.empty())
00857       dimmap[&domains[i]] = 2;
00858     else {
00859       dof.resize( domains[i].vertices.size() );
00860       domains[i].domain->domain_DoF( &(domains[i].vertices[0]), arrptr(dof), dof.size(), err );
00861       MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00862       unsigned short dim = *std::max_element( dof.begin(), dof.end() );
00863       dimmap[&domains[i]] = dim;
00864     }
00865   }
00866   
00867   // group domains by dimension
00868   std::vector<DomainSet*> points, curves, surfaces;
00869   for (std::map<DomainSet*,int>::iterator it = dimmap.begin(); it != dimmap.end(); ++it) {
00870     switch (it->second) {
00871       case 0:
00872         points.push_back( it->first );
00873         break;
00874       case 1:
00875         curves.push_back( it->first );
00876         break;
00877       case 2:
00878         surfaces.push_back( it->first );
00879         break;
00880       default:
00881         MSQ_SETERR(err)(MsqError::INVALID_STATE, "Invalid domain dimension: %d\n", it->second);
00882         break;
00883     }
00884   }
00885   
00886   // check that each point-domain has a single vertex
00887   for (i = 0; i < points.size(); ++i) {
00888     if (points[i]->vertices.size() != 1 ||
00889        !points[i]->elements.empty()) {
00890       MSQ_SETERR(err)("Point domain mesh not a single vertex.", MsqError::INVALID_STATE);
00891       return;
00892     }
00893   }
00894   
00895   // check that each curve domain has a chain of connected edges
00896   std::set<Mesh::VertexHandle> unseen;
00897   for (i = 0; i < curves.size(); ++i) {
00898     if (!curves[i]->elements.empty()) {
00899       MSQ_SETERR(err)("Elements associated with 1D domain.",MsqError::INVALID_STATE);
00900       return;
00901     }
00902   
00903     unseen.clear();
00904     std::copy( curves[i]->vertices.begin(),
00905                    curves[i]->vertices.end(),
00906                    std::inserter(unseen,unseen.begin()) );
00907     
00908     const Mesh::VertexHandle first_vtx = *unseen.begin();
00909     unseen.erase(unseen.begin());
00910     Mesh::VertexHandle vtx = first_vtx; 
00911       // find chain of vertices
00912     while (next_vertex(mesh, vtx, unseen, err))
00913       MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00914       // search again from the starting vertex because
00915       // it probably wasn't the first one on the curve
00916     vtx = first_vtx;
00917     while (next_vertex(mesh, vtx, unseen, err))
00918       MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00919       // were all vertices in a chain?
00920     if (!unseen.empty()) {
00921       MSQ_SETERR(err)("Curve domain contains vertices not in a simply connected chain.", MsqError::INVALID_STATE );
00922       return;
00923     }
00924   }
00925   
00926   
00927   std::set<Mesh::VertexHandle> seen;
00928   std::set<Mesh::ElementHandle> remaining;
00929   std::vector<Mesh::VertexHandle> verts, verts2;
00930   std::vector<Mesh::ElementHandle> stack, vert_elems;
00931   std::vector<EntityTopology> types;
00932   std::vector<size_t> junk;
00933     // if surface contains elements...
00934   for (i = 0; i < surfaces.size(); ++i) {
00935     if (surfaces[i]->elements.empty())
00936       continue;
00937       
00938       // Check that any vertices on surface are contained in an
00939       // element on the surface.
00940     verts.clear();
00941     mesh->elements_get_attached_vertices( &(surfaces[i]->elements[0]),
00942                                           surfaces[i]->elements.size(),
00943                                           verts, junk, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00944     seen.clear();
00945     std::copy( verts.begin(), verts.end(), std::inserter(seen,seen.begin()) );
00946 
00947     std::vector<Mesh::VertexHandle>::const_iterator v;
00948     for (v = surfaces[i]->vertices.begin(); v != surfaces[i]->vertices.end(); ++v) {
00949       std::set<Mesh::VertexHandle>::iterator j = seen.find(*v);
00950       if (j == seen.end()) {
00951         MSQ_SETERR(err)("Vertex on surface domain not in any element.",
00952                         MsqError::INVALID_STATE);
00953         return;
00954       }
00955     }
00956       
00957       // check that elements form 2D patch
00958     stack.clear();
00959     remaining.clear();
00960     std::copy( surfaces[i]->elements.begin(),
00961                    surfaces[i]->elements.end(),
00962                    std::inserter(remaining,remaining.begin()) );
00963     stack.push_back( *remaining.begin() );
00964     remaining.erase(remaining.begin());
00965     while (!stack.empty()) {
00966       Mesh::ElementHandle elem = stack.back();
00967       stack.pop_back();
00968       verts.clear();
00969       mesh->elements_get_attached_vertices( &elem, 1, verts, junk, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00970       // for each edge
00971       for (size_t j = 0; j < verts.size(); ++j) {
00972         Mesh::VertexHandle v1 = verts[j], v2 = verts[(j+1)%verts.size()];
00973         vert_elems.clear();
00974         mesh->vertices_get_attached_elements( &v1, 1, vert_elems, junk, 
00975                                               err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00976         types.resize( vert_elems.size() );
00977         if (!vert_elems.empty()) {
00978           mesh->elements_get_topologies( arrptr(vert_elems), arrptr(types), 
00979                                  vert_elems.size(), err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00980         }
00981         while (!vert_elems.empty()) {
00982           Mesh::ElementHandle e2 = vert_elems.back();
00983           EntityTopology type = types.back();
00984           vert_elems.pop_back();
00985           types.pop_back();
00986           if (TopologyInfo::dimension(type) != 2)
00987             continue;
00988           verts2.clear();
00989           mesh->elements_get_attached_vertices( &e2, 1, verts2, junk, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00990           size_t idx = std::find(verts2.begin(), verts2.end(), v1 ) - verts2.begin();
00991           if (verts2[(idx+1)%verts2.size()] != v2 &&
00992               verts2[(idx+verts2.size()-1)%verts2.size()] != v2)
00993             continue;
00994           std::set<Mesh::ElementHandle>::iterator r = remaining.find(e2);
00995           if (r == remaining.end())
00996             continue;
00997 
00998           stack.push_back(*r);
00999           remaining.erase(r);
01000         }
01001       }
01002     }
01003 
01004     if (!remaining.empty()) {
01005       MSQ_SETERR(err)("Surface mesh not a single, simply-connected patch", 
01006                       MsqError::INVALID_STATE);
01007       return;
01008     }
01009   }
01010     
01011       // check that sides of volume elements that are on surface
01012       // form simply connected patch
01013   for (i = 0; i < surfaces.size(); ++i) {
01014       // build list of sides known to be on surface
01015     std::sort( surfaces[i]->vertices.begin(), surfaces[i]->vertices.end() );
01016     std::set< std::pair<Mesh::ElementHandle,int> > sides;
01017     for (size_t j= 0; j < surfaces[i]->vertices.size(); ++j) {
01018       Mesh::VertexHandle v = surfaces[i]->vertices[j];
01019       vert_elems.clear();
01020       mesh->vertices_get_attached_elements( &v, 1, vert_elems, junk, 
01021                                             err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01022       types.resize( vert_elems.size() );
01023       if (!vert_elems.empty()) {
01024         mesh->elements_get_topologies( arrptr(vert_elems), arrptr(types), 
01025                                vert_elems.size(), err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01026       }
01027       while (!vert_elems.empty()) {
01028         Mesh::ElementHandle e = vert_elems.back();
01029         EntityTopology type = types.back();
01030         vert_elems.pop_back();
01031         types.pop_back();
01032         if (TopologyInfo::dimension(type) != 3)
01033           continue;
01034         verts.clear();
01035         mesh->elements_get_attached_vertices( &e, 1, verts, junk, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01036           
01037         for (unsigned s = 0; s < TopologyInfo::faces(type); ++s) {
01038           unsigned n;
01039           const unsigned *si = TopologyInfo::face_vertices( type, s, n );
01040           unsigned ns = 0;
01041           for (unsigned k = 0; k < n; ++k) {
01042             if (std::binary_search(surfaces[i]->vertices.begin(),
01043                                        surfaces[i]->vertices.end(),
01044                                        verts[si[k]]))
01045               ++ns;
01046           }
01047           if (ns >= 3) 
01048             sides.insert( std::pair<Mesh::ElementHandle,int>(e,s) );
01049         }
01050       }
01051     }
01052     
01053     std::vector< std::pair<Mesh::ElementHandle,int> > sstack;
01054     sstack.push_back( *sides.begin() );
01055     sides.erase(sides.begin());
01056     while (!sstack.empty()) {
01057       Mesh::ElementHandle e = sstack.back().first;
01058       int s = sstack.back().second;
01059       sstack.pop_back();
01060       
01061       verts.clear();
01062       mesh->elements_get_attached_vertices( &e, 1, verts, junk, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01063       EntityTopology type;
01064       mesh->elements_get_topologies( &e, &type, 1, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01065       unsigned n;
01066       const unsigned *si = TopologyInfo::face_vertices( type, s, n );
01067       
01068       // for each edge
01069       for (unsigned j = 0; j < n; ++j) {
01070         Mesh::VertexHandle v1 = verts[si[j]], v2 = verts[si[(j+1)%n]];
01071         vert_elems.clear();
01072         mesh->vertices_get_attached_elements( &v1, 1, vert_elems, junk, 
01073                                               err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01074         types.resize( vert_elems.size() );
01075         if (!vert_elems.empty()) {
01076           mesh->elements_get_topologies( arrptr(vert_elems), arrptr(types), 
01077                                  vert_elems.size(), err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01078         }
01079         while (!vert_elems.empty()) {
01080           Mesh::ElementHandle e2 = vert_elems.back();
01081           EntityTopology type2 = types.back();
01082           vert_elems.pop_back();
01083           types.pop_back();
01084           if (TopologyInfo::dimension(type) != 3)
01085             continue;
01086           verts2.clear();
01087           mesh->elements_get_attached_vertices( &e2, 1, verts2, junk, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01088             // for each face
01089           for (unsigned s2 = 0; s2 < TopologyInfo::faces(type2); ++s2) {
01090             std::set< std::pair<Mesh::ElementHandle,int> >::iterator side;
01091             side = sides.find( std::pair<Mesh::ElementHandle,int>(e2,s2) );
01092             if (side == sides.end())
01093               continue;
01094           
01095             unsigned n2;
01096             const unsigned* si2 = TopologyInfo::face_vertices( type2, s2, n2 );
01097             unsigned idx;
01098             for (idx = 0; idx < n2; ++idx)
01099               if (verts2[si2[idx]] == v1)
01100                 break;
01101             assert( idx < n2 );
01102             
01103             if (verts2[si2[(idx+1)%n2]] == v2 ||
01104                 verts2[si2[(idx+n2-1)%n2]] == v2) {
01105               sstack.push_back( *side );
01106               sides.erase( side );
01107             }
01108           }
01109         }
01110       }
01111     }
01112 
01113     if (!sides.empty()) {
01114       MSQ_SETERR(err)("Surface mesh not a single, simply-connected patch", 
01115                       MsqError::INVALID_STATE);
01116       return;
01117     }
01118   }
01119 }
01120     
01121   
01122 
01123 static inline
01124 bool operator<( const Mesh::EntityHandle h, 
01125                 const DomainClassifier::DomainBlock& b )
01126   { return h < b.firstHandle; }
01127 
01128 static inline
01129 bool operator<( const DomainClassifier::DomainBlock& b,
01130                 const Mesh::EntityHandle h )
01131   { return b.lastHandle < h; }
01132 
01133 static inline
01134 bool operator<( const DomainClassifier::DomainBlock& b,
01135                             const DomainClassifier::DomainBlock& c )
01136 { return b.lastHandle < c.firstHandle; }
01137 
01138 MeshDomain* DomainClassifier::find_domain(
01139                Mesh::EntityHandle handle,
01140                const std::vector<DomainClassifier::DomainBlock>& list )
01141 {
01142   std::vector<DomainClassifier::DomainBlock>::const_iterator i;
01143   i = std::lower_bound( list.begin(), list.end(), handle );
01144   return (i != list.end() && i->firstHandle <= handle) ? i->domain : NULL;
01145 }
01146 
01147 void DomainClassifier::snap_to( Mesh::EntityHandle entity_handle,
01148                                 Vector3D &coordinate ) const
01149 {
01150   if (const MeshDomain* dom = find_vertex_domain( entity_handle )) 
01151     dom->snap_to( entity_handle, coordinate );
01152 }
01153 
01154 void DomainClassifier::vertex_normal_at(Mesh::VertexHandle entity_handle,
01155                                   Vector3D &coordinate) const
01156 {
01157   if (const MeshDomain* dom = find_vertex_domain( entity_handle )) 
01158     dom->vertex_normal_at( entity_handle, coordinate );
01159 }
01160 
01161 void DomainClassifier::element_normal_at(Mesh::ElementHandle entity_handle,
01162                                   Vector3D &coordinate) const
01163 {
01164   if (const MeshDomain* dom = find_element_domain( entity_handle )) 
01165     dom->element_normal_at( entity_handle, coordinate );
01166 }
01167                                   
01168 void DomainClassifier::vertex_normal_at( const Mesh::VertexHandle* handles,
01169                                          Vector3D coordinates[],
01170                                          unsigned count,
01171                                          MsqError& err ) const
01172 {
01173   for (unsigned i = 0; i < count; ++i) {
01174     const MeshDomain* dom = find_vertex_domain( handles[i] );
01175     if (!dom) {
01176       MSQ_SETERR(err)(MsqError::INVALID_ARG);
01177       return;
01178     }
01179     dom->vertex_normal_at( handles+i, coordinates+i, 1, err );
01180     MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01181   }
01182 }
01183 
01184 void DomainClassifier::closest_point( Mesh::VertexHandle handle,
01185                                       const Vector3D& position,
01186                                       Vector3D& closest,
01187                                       Vector3D& normal,
01188                                       MsqError& err ) const
01189 {
01190   if (const MeshDomain* dom = find_vertex_domain( handle )) 
01191     dom->closest_point( handle, position, closest, normal, err );
01192 }
01193 
01194 void DomainClassifier::domain_DoF( const Mesh::VertexHandle* handles,
01195                                    unsigned short* dof_array,
01196                                    size_t num_handles,
01197                                    MsqError& err ) const
01198 {
01199   for (size_t i = 0; i < num_handles; ++i) {
01200     const MeshDomain* dom = find_vertex_domain( handles[i] );
01201     if (!dom) 
01202       dof_array[i] = 3;
01203     else {
01204       dom->domain_DoF( handles + i, dof_array + i, 1, err );
01205       MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01206     }
01207   }
01208 }
01209 
01210 DomainClassifier::~DomainClassifier()
01211 {
01212   if (deleteSubDomains)
01213     delete_all_sub_domains();
01214 }
01215 
01216 void DomainClassifier::delete_all_sub_domains()
01217 {
01218     // get unique list of domains
01219   std::set<MeshDomain*> domains;
01220   std::vector<DomainBlock>::iterator i;
01221   for (i = vertexList.begin(); i != vertexList.end(); ++i)
01222     domains.insert( i->domain );
01223   for (i = elementList.begin(); i != elementList.end(); ++i)
01224     domains.insert( i->domain );
01225   std::set<MeshDomain*>::iterator j;
01226   for (j = domains.begin(); j != domains.end(); ++j)
01227     delete *j;
01228   clear();
01229 }
